reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-fitting, soft, and comfortable, with one noting it can be dressed up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sort and stretchy, flattering length and style for most body types and sizes. Love it!
items.body: Very soft, front is not see through, flattering fit, reaching mid hip, strechy, true to size. Mine arrived with a small hole, likeley due to vacuum packaging. I still love it and recommend it due to how soft it is and also the long length of the body and sleeves. Color is as pictured. Despite the pencil size hole I had to stitch, I would recommend this product. It shows some cleavage, but a cami would make it appropriate for all events, as the front is double layered and the wrap appearance + length + stretch hide the tiny belly my fitted jeans cause. True to size: Iâ€™m 5,4â€, 130lbs, and size S hugs my curves perfectly due to the design and stretch of the soft fabric. It has a cashmere-like feel, which I love. No need to size up or down, and no need to keep pulling it down, due to the generous length. I would highly recommend this garment for my â€˜plus sizeâ€™ family members of all ages, due to the fact it shows off your waist line and stretches to cover hips without riding up, even when leaning or bending. Comfortable and not over priced. Warm, without being bulky. Buttons are not functional but add style, making this light sweater appear to be a true wrap. *Iâ€™m happy * Read more
items.author: April Marko (Spirit Conduit)

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and as pictured
items.body: Great color and style, both as pictured! They are only a little sheer. I got the light colored beige and just need to wear a non print bra or one in the same color family as the top to have it not be noticed. It is comfy, soft and feels decently well made. I did go a size up. If you are between sizes do go larger. No need to over compensate though. They are stretch fit but not tight. Liking my purchaseðŸ™‚ Read more
items.author: pgecco

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft & Comfortable ~
items.body: I am 5â€™5â€, 110lbs and a 36C - ordered size small. After reading some reviews, I was nervous I ordered the wrong size but after trying on, it fits nicely. The material I found to be thin but not too thin and it is very soft. The sleeve length is somewhat extended, which I also prefer. Neckline is also ideal, I do not feel that it drops too low or reveals cleavage. I have not washed the top yet but when I do, I will use a lingerie bag, wash on cold and light dryer cycle. Will update my review if I incur any quality issues after washing. For the price point, I feel the top is a good value. I gave 4 stars in lieu of 5 because it may be a more challenging fit for someone that is large in the bust area. Read more
items.author: Kimberly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great!
items.body: So soft and cuddly. I bought two and honestly in a cold Pennsylvania climate, I will certainly buy in more colors. I could buy this and wear daily! Try it out honestly I love it. The fit is great the style looks awesome over my chest, and warm weather appropriate. As far as the quality, itâ€™s a little thin, but I donâ€™t mind it. I would say it a quality piece that I will wear often. It didnâ€™t shrink in the washer either. Color stayed without any fading. Read more
items.author: Madie Parrish

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this top!
items.body: I love this sweater!! It's very thin and depending on what your wearing it for you might need a tank top underneath bc it's super low cut but it's very sexy! It's a cute fit it's very comfortable and it's good quality. I live this shirt so much I got it in a few other colors!! Read more
items.author: louisa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty shirt but runs small and pills after washing
items.body: I love the style of the shirt. Runs a bit small but still fit ok. Color is beautiful. Gave 3 stars because of the pilling after washing even after washing on delicate cycle and letting air dry Read more
items.author: Dana Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Figure flattering top with soft fabric.
items.body: Soft fabric and a great fit. Very comfortable. I bought a large and it fits as great as the model. Obviously Iâ€™m heavier, but it certainly flattered my figure and I felt as confident as what I saw in the picture. So I guess you could say the shirt is figure flattering. Read more
items.author: Anna Heston

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Sweater!
items.body: Love this sweater - form fitting, perfect cleavage showing, lightweight, and gorgeous! Runs a bit small, so size up. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Brown, Deep Green, Burgundy, Rust Orange, Dark Blue, Light Green, Black, Grey, Light Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
